experience.title: Global Markets Intern
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Contributed to the revenue and financial forecasting capabilities of the Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review (CCAR) Team of JPMC‚Ä¢ Explored various ML models using python to identify Geometric Brownian Motion as an approach to forecast macroeconomic variables‚Ä¢ Reduced RMSE by 71% on optimising the randomness of the model using different path selection approaches based on insample results‚Ä¢ Applied qualitative & statistical techniques to analyse revenues of different businesses for stress testing across different scenarios of company

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Analyzed and wrangled data at district level to understand current food situation and its availability for underprivileged households of India‚Ä¢ Structured the data containing 4L+ rows using preprocessing techniques like imputation & implemented feature engineering on multiple columns‚Ä¢ Applied python wrapper, tabula-Py, to read PDFs into a list of data frames to execute the Extract Transform & Load (ETL) data modelling‚Ä¢ Created a common template to convert unstructured data of PDF format, into a structured tabular format to automate the entire process

experience.title: Governor
experience.description: Drama is theatre ,an escape from life, happiness ,and sadness all rolled into one .  Pravah believes drama is fun-enjoying the moments on stage and giving our audience a worthwhile experience . Being an active member ,i have represented IIT Kharagpur in Streetplay 2019(Spring Fest ,IIT KGP)Apart from this ,I have also been a part of two other productions,which include 1 stage play ,1 street play . I have also played an integral role in directing and scripting a short film.
